titles.title: To ensure that persons who enroll in the managed health care program of the Department of Defense known as TRICARE Prime retain coverage under the program in any TRICARE region.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on National Security.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 6/26/1997--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Defense to ensure that persons enrolled in TRICARE Prime (a Department of Defense managed health care option) are permitted to transfer their enrollment to another region of the TRICARE program whenever the beneficiary resides or travels in the other region.
